item.title: CVE-2022-1438|2024-09-24T15:06:01.676Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20single%20sign-on%207
item.description: A flaw was found in Keycloak. Under specific circumstances, HTML entities are not sanitized during user impersonation, resulting in a Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
